messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

please provide us with a screen capture of puma tuesday february pm re la hi please provide screen capture puma old cannot probably archived find excel export please administrator phone tuesday february pm re la si accounts payable february pm la null null null sc supplier visit out channel camera working properly cost inactive equipments null administrator phone february pm la accounts payable february pm la bun la se pare pl tit pl tit pl ti ca la recent la puma february pm re la archive february pm re la la pl care ti february pm re la la mine agenda spun client february pm la ave idee se february la la cine va lei total director
